products.title: Splash Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash solar yellow is a bright and sunny yellow vertical blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous yellow vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Rose Gold 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash rose gold vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant rose gold fabric with a beautiful hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash mellow yellow is a chic pastel yellow vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this yellow vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
